description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The goal of Junkyard Battle is to build a higher junk tower than your opponent. Use your crane claw to stack stuff and pick up power-ups to gain speed, time och concrete your tower.  Single player training missions are available but make sure you try out the multiplayer battle mode!
description.short: The goal of Junkyard Battle is to build a higher junk tower than your opponent. Use your crane claw to stack stuff and pick up power-ups to gain speed, time och concrete your tower.
